Item.name: INVALID ITEM
Item.description: This is a null placeholder for the ritual validator to function

Item.name: Himalayan Rock Salt
Item.description: Presumably just regular salt. I guess it's pink? A common ingredient in both cooking and summoning.

Item.name: Herb
Item.description: Smelly stuff rich people cook with. Adds flavor to summoning circles as well.

Item.name: Essential Oil
Item.description: An essential ingredient for lubricating entities into existence.

Item.name: Carved Stone
Item.description: Patterns of inexplicable origin surround its surface. This should make for a fine catalyst.

Item.name: Sun-Warmed Stone
Item.description: Duncan says this stone refuses to cool when moved indoors, making it a curious catalyst and ingredient in summoning.

Item.name: Small Animal Heart
Item.description: Wow, this is the real thing alright. A crude yet powerful catalyst and summoning ingredient.

Item.name: Foreign Relic
Item.description: Artifact of historical significance. What significance? Fueling of the the dark procession, of course!

Item.name: Human Corpse
Item.description: A necessary implement in any real summoner's arsenal. This is what seperates the men from the gods.

Item.name: Kindling
Item.description: The old me used to buy this just to watch it burn. Now it's only a summoning ingredient to me.

Item.name: Rotting Deer Heart
Item.description: I'd typically opt to preseve this stuff, but it's properties as a catalyst awaken with decomposition.

Item.name: Unsettling Shard
Item.description: Debris of completely unknown origin. Where the unenlightened see a rock, I see a catalyst.

Item.name: Human Sacrifice
Item.description: This is a live human being, who has agreed to honorably give their life for the cause.
